prompt.sub: You can improve your transcription with a prompt

data.heading: Tell me your medical problems
data.privacy: Video is not stored on our servers, it is solely used for transcription.
data.privacySave: Video is not stored on our servers, and will go away as soon as you leave the page.
data.camera_denied: Camera permission is denied. We don't store your attempts anywhere, but we understand not wanting to give us access to your camera. Try again by opening t,his page in an incognito window or enable permissions in your browser settings
data.chat_placeholder: I'm an LLM pretending to be a Doctor! Ask me your doubts!
